name: Flower Defense (F4B1)
description:
Shoot your Way through Hordes of Zombies and protect your precious Plant!

Protect your Plant

There are multiple types of Enemies:

The Zombie: the normal guy

The Giant: The bigger variant of the zombie. He tanks more shots and makes more damage, but is slower than the Zombie

The Mini Zombie: The smaller variant of the zombie. He is very                   fast

The Miner: The Miner is able to dig into the ground and then is invulnerable to Bullets. Although, he is still affected by Grenades

The Devil: The Devil is fast, tanks much and deals a lot of damage. The perfect Allrounder

Hey! I am Fabian, an 16 year old Developer from Germany and really appreciate the positive feedback on my game!
I made it using the Unity Engine, Aseprite for Sprites, Beepbox for music and Sfxia and BFXR for Sounds.
